'''Arachne''' is a human-spider hybrid monster based on the [[Wikipedia:Arachne|character]] from Greek mythology.
== Appearance ==
Arachne has a red abdomen with four holes on top. Instead of a spider's cephalothorax, she has a human head with red eyes and a body, and her legs have white stripes.

== Personality ==
{{empty section}}

== Power and Abilities ==
Arachne, being a hybrid of a spider and a human, can jump far, run fast and weave webs.
